location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has a hole in the text.

mods.abstract: Letter forwards correspondence and bills from Bussora [Basra] and reports that there has been no further news from Schiras [Shiraz]. An additional note of the same date states that letters from Mr LaTouche in Bussora have just been received and gives a summary of them, including news from Schiras.
